title: Straight From The Horse's Mouth (feat. Jessica Kirson)
description: Dan tells the gang about the new Lifetime holiday movie “Feliz Navi-Dad” starring Mario Lopez & Jay expresses his fascination of The Wendy Williams Show. Christine, Dan and Jay discuss how the bullied can become the bullies. Jessica Kirson joined the show and talked about her therapy session with a horse.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
